pages.description:
Project Eden strives to be a welcoming and supportive environment for creators of all kinds. To help facilitate involvement from the community and support your ambitions as a creator, we have created exclusive badges for content creators. If you produce Project Eden related content on Twitch, YouTube, or any other platform, you can apply to receive your badge and access to the #creators channel on Discord, where you can announce when you go live or release new content.
Rules
  1. You may advertise your channel in our Discord's #creators channel and in-game once per day, and only when you are creating content on Project Eden
  2. If you or your followers show a pattern of misbehavior, your badge and/or access to the server may be revoked
  3. Do not purposefully flood the community with players
  4. You must be Member rank to apply
FAQ
Q: Does the badge expire?
A: Yes, if no Project Eden related content is created for 1 year, your badges will expire and you will have to re-apply
Q: Can I have more than one badge?
A: You can own multiple badges, but only one can be active at any one time. You may switch badges as often as you like (/badge <platform>)
Q: Can I create content about other communities?
A: Yes, Project Eden will not police your content in any way
Q: How does the "no advertising" rule apply to me?
A: See Rule #1. What you advertise outside of Project Eden is up to you; however, if we observe any malicious intent, your badge and/or access to the server may be revoked

questions.label: Link to your channel(s)
questions.description: Please provide links to every platform you wish to obtain badges for, and make sure examples of previous content are publicly available for review

questions.label: Describe your channel and your content, as well as what type of content you plan to make on Project Eden.
What are your goals as a content creator?
questions.description: Do you have any specific goals for your channel and community? What goals do you have specifically within Project Eden?

questions.label: How often do you plan to make content on or about Project Eden?
Is your content made for mature audiences (18+)?
questions.description: If yes or if you are unsure, please elaborate and give examples of the kind of content that will appear on your channel that may not be family-friendly (e.g. swearing, alcohol, etc). Answering yes does not automatically disqualify you from being accepted. If accepted, any links to your channel may be marked as 18+ only in order to protect our younger players.

name: Builder
title: Builder Application
description: Builders help with any build related needs for the server, such as events, minigame maps, spawns, and warps. They frequently collaborate as a team on large-scale projects. Strong technical skills, such as proficiency in WorldEdit and an in-depth knowledge of Minecraft mechanics, are essential for achieving the highest quality work. Additionally, Builders may assist in designing custom items and blocks for the server resource pack using Blockbench.
thanks: We truly appreciate your dedication to the community and your desire to help us grow and thrive. The staff team will review your application and reach out if we have any follow-up questions.

pages.description:
Builders handle all construction-related tasks for the server, including event areas, minigame maps, spawns, and warps. They often work together on large-scale projects, combining their talents to bring ambitious ideas to life. Strong technical abilities—such as mastery of WorldEdit and a deep understanding of Minecraft mechanics—are crucial for producing top-quality results. Builders may also contribute to the creation of custom items and blocks for the server’s resource pack using tools like Blockbench.
The Builder rank is not just a title — it comes with real responsibilities. If promoted, you will be expected to actively contribute to ongoing projects, meet agreed deadlines, and collaborate effectively with other team members to maintain the server’s high standards.

name: Moderator
title: Moderator Application
description: Moderators serve as the front line of the server staff, ensuring a smooth and enjoyable experience for all players. Their responsibilities include answering player questions, resolving griefing issues, moderating chat, and addressing general player concerns. Beyond day-to-day support, Moderators actively contribute to the server's growth by collaborating with senior staff to brainstorm ideas and assist in implementing exciting new features that enhance the community experience.
thanks: We truly appreciate your dedication to the community and your desire to help us grow and thrive. The staff team will review your application and reach out if we have any follow-up questions.

pages.description:
Project Eden's staff members are essential to the server. Without our dedicated staff members, the server would not, and could not, be what it is today. If you want to become part of that team, and give new players the same welcoming experience you got when you joined for the first time, if not an even better one, then please apply for Moderator! We'd love to have you.
A moderator's number one priority is keeping the server running smoothly. They fix grief, answer any questions a player might have, control chat, and settle disputes. Moderators must be well-tempered, patient, kind, helpful, and have to be extremely familiar with how the server works. However, moderators also are expected to participate in behind-the-scenes server development, whether that be providing opinions in the staff chat about new features or how to reform an old one, relaying feedback about how the server can improve from a player's perspective, and many other development related tasks. You must also be very active in the community and plan to continue that trend into the foreseeable future.
